After setting up settings, please assign React Slider Block to layouts in Design -> Layouts.
This can be done by choosing a layout and adding the React Images Slider block to the Header bottom section in the Home page layout.

To change images please edit the Graphic Banners from React Image Slider banners group in Design -> Banners

Auto change time (ms):
Miliseconds. Type 3000 for 3s interval.

Static preload image:
